0: This hotel is in a perfect location
We only had breakfast in the hotel and it was very good value
very good and also very pricey lucky the ISK is still trading low good location too
The main plus point of the of this hotel is the staff
Breakfast is good and not the same mass produced breakfasts you find in many hotels
The gym had the basic equipment in it water and clean towels there was lots of parking in the area
Inside the room was lovely a suite under the eaves of the roof in the old part of the hotel there are two sections one new and one old
We had a nice size business room in a quiet spot in the hotel
1: The bed was a good size but I can not understand why you would not buy duvets to fit them
Every excursion was an easy pick up and drop off
Great place but no parking and it is expensive
We stayed 22nd to 28th December had two rooms 32 and 302
I offered to find a mutually agreeable solution REFUSED cited policy
I paid more for this hotel than I have for the same class of hotel anywhere else but you ca n’t beat the location and the rooms are large
The piece de resistance was the chef ’s 3course meal at the Michelin recommended restaurant Grild on the 8th floor of the hotel overlooking the city lights fabulous
Local to all th etown centre amenities restaurants bars and general site seeing
However there was exceptionally good breakfast in the morning
2: Nobody said I will fix this og sorry for the trouble or offered me any assist
Needs better lighting in the room
Water pressure low in the shower
Had a big TV kettle even green teabags in the room
Outside the special offers drinks are expensive however but this is typical in Iceland and it is a quality hotel after all
about £ 15 and they let us swap beer for a glass of house wine
Some of the reception staff could have been more helpful
Avoid room 419 it is windowles frowsy room with low ceiling
Overall for the price I would probably find another hotel but being that this was a business trip this was the chosen hotel
I came back out to find 100 euro fine literally in 5 mins
